root.name: StarCraft II: Legacy of the Void
root.description: OverviewStarCraft II: Legacy of the Void is the third and final expansion of StarCraft II. The campaign will focus on the Protoss and will be set chronologically after StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty, the Terran campaign, and StarCraft II: Heart of the Swarm, the Zerg campaign.Preliminary development started shortly after Blizzard Entertainment shipped Heart of the Swarm. Based on events that occurred in the previous expansion, Legacy of the Void will focus specifically on Zeratul, who has been gathering information on the Xel'Naga.
